title: 9 Clues 2: The Ward 1.0 – Solve the mystery of Mnemosyne Asylum!
content: “The Ward” is the second installment in the 9 Clues series, in which a young detective and her partner respond to a distress call from a psychiatric hospital on a secluded island.   The island is isolated by freezing waters and constant, brutal storms. title: Doorways: Holy Mountains of Flesh 1.0 – An Immersive Horror Adventure Game

title: Regextor 1.0.2 – Polish your regular expressions
content: Regextor lets you tune-up your regexps! See exactly what your regular expression matches in the sample text.   Version 1.0.2: Fixing an inifinite-regex bug   Intel, 64-bit processor OS X 10.10 or later

title: Emulsion 1.4.0 – Photo library catalog
content: Emulsion is a new photo catalog app. Emulsion can adjust exposure, colors, and almost everything else. You can also add gradients to your images to darken skies, or even add dust and scratches for a cool retro look. Emulsion can apply adjustments, effects, and metadata changes to one or hundreds of images at once. Want […]
